reviews.review_msg: Emrul is a grate prof and has a sense of humor. He gives examples to make the students understand the concept well.  he knows exactly what he is doing and does his job well.  Speak out the class to get the full participation mark. I was shy to speak out during the class.

Emrul is an outstanding instructor. He uses real world experience and examples to help you better grasp the material in the course. Cares about his students and is willing to stay behind if you have any additional questions.
Good teacherexplain concept clearly and based on real world experience.
